snippet: Reliance on subscribers to Star Wars: The Old Republic is dealt a blow as 400,000 subscribers defect.
lead_paragraph: Reliance on subscribers to Star Wars: The Old Republic is dealt a blow as 400,000 subscribers defect.

headline.seo: Electronic Arts Posts a Loss and Loses Big Game Subscribers
